channel.title: Spawing items
channel.description:
hi, i want to make a spawn server where player can spawn items for free,
can sum tell me how to start and where

item.title: Spawing items
item.dc:creator: @DreadScape DreadScape
item.description:
@DreadScape wrote:

You can also block items as well, (ex: money 995 or rares) So people cant spawn the best of best, they have to earn that like by pking/donating/voting.

Read full topic

item.title: Spawing items
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

If you’re using project insanity just put an item command in the regular player void, and I would suggest adding

if (c.inWild()) return;

So that players wont be able to spawn in the wild. ^^^ There is more to the code of course, this is just the example. Pretty easy to find a tut.

Read full topic

item.title: Spawing items
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:7, topic:526775”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=645523.msg4341911#msg4341911 date=1375288511]

I hate that version of the command…
here’s mine… You can spawn by doing ::item 995

lol, implying this isn’t the case in 1000 servers

I actually re wrote most of it. I need to re-do it again because looking at it again it looks like trash…
[/quote]

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) c.getItems().addItem(Integer.parseInt(args[1], Integer.parseInt(args[2]); else if (args.length == 2) c.getItems().addItem(Integer.parseInt(args[1], 1; else c.sendMessage("Command usage; ::item id (amount)"); } [/quote]
Like I said, I need to re-write my command again.

Read full topic

item.title: Spawing items
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:526775”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=645523.msg4341903#msg4341903 date=1375287708]

I hate that version of the command…
here’s mine… You can spawn by doing ::item 995

lol, implying this isn’t the case in 1000 servers
[/quote]
I actually re wrote most of it. I need to re-do it again because looking at it again it looks like trash…[/quote]

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3)
c.getItems().addItem(Integer.parseInt(args[1], Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
else if (args.length == 2)
c.getItems().addItem(Integer.parseInt(args[1], 1;
else
c.sendMessage("Command usage; ::item id (amount)");
}

Read full topic

item.title: Spawing items
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Java-RSPS-Noob, post:3, topic:526775”]“not mine”

[code=java]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) || playerCommand.startsWith(“pickup”)) {
if(c.inWild()) {
c.sendMessage(“You cannot do this in the wilderniss.”);
return;
}
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
// add restricted items here.
int restrictedItems[] = {1050, 1051};

for (int i : restrictedItems) {
if (i == newItemID) {
if (c.playerRights != 4) {
c.sendMessage(“This item is restricted!”);
return;
}
}
}
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::item_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

}
}[/code][/quote]
I hate that version of the command…
here’s mine… You can spawn by doing ::item 995
instead of adding an amount, it spawns 1 item

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) { try { int newItemID; int newItemAmount; String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { c.sendMessage("<shad=505>That item ID does not exist.</shad>"); } }else if(args.length == 2){ newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, 1); } else { c.sendMessage("<shad=505>That item ID does not exist.</shad>"); } } else { c.sendMessage("<shad=505>Wrong usage: ::item ID AMOUNT</shad>"); } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("<shad=12976156>You dun goofed. Try again.</shad"); } } [.code]

Read full topic

item.title: Spawing items
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

“not mine”

[code=java]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) || playerCommand.startsWith(“pickup”)) {
if(c.inWild()) {
c.sendMessage(“You cannot do this in the wilderniss.”);
return;
}
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
// add restricted items here.
int restrictedItems[] = {1050, 1051};

for (int i : restrictedItems) {
if (i == newItemID) {
if (c.playerRights != 4) {
c.sendMessage(“This item is restricted!”);
return;
}
}
}
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::item_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

}
}[/code]

Read full topic
